text: Sphingomonas panni is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming and rod-shaped bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from a sponge from an examination room in the University for Veterinary Medicine Vienna in Austria.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas panni at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase panni Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Sphingomonas panni
